classes.components

Class Ranger

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.components.Ranger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Ranger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Object that handles tasks related with the setting up of the selection .

    • Method Detail

      • range

        public void range(int spaceBegin,
                  int spaceEnd)
        Sets the starting point of selection and the ending point of selection. If spaceBegin is greater than spaceEnd, they will switch values.
        Parameters:
        spaceBegin - starting point of selection
        spaceEnd - ending point of selection

        Returns:
